articles.title: Last public defender in YSL trial moves to withdraw as counsel, says she can’t earn ‘livable wage’ - WSB Atlanta
articles.description: The last appointed public defender in the YSL trial has motioned to leave, citing financial burdens created by the case.
articles.content:
ATLANTA — A lawyer representing a defendant in the Young Slime Life gang trial in Fulton County has filed a motion to withdraw as counsel, citing financial issues resulting from the case itself.
